   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to BindingSitesFromFragments's documentation!
=====================================================

This is the documentation for the BindingSiteFromFragments method developed by James Lucas in the Kortemme Lab for
*de novo* design of small molecule binding sites.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   Installation
   Usage/index
